languages.text: "Как видите, я умею быть благодарной и щедрой. И вы, уверена, тоже". {n}Джай с намеком подмигивает вам.{/n} "Обещаю, что и в будущем всякий ваш дар буду принимать с почтением и трепетом".

"As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."
languages.original_text: "Как видите, я умею быть благодарной и щедрой. И вы, уверена, тоже". {n}Джай с намеком подмигивает вам.{/n} "Обещаю, что и в будущем всякий ваш дар буду принимать с почтением и трепетом".

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Como puede ver, sé cómo ser agradecida y generosa, igual que sé que usted sabe». {n}Jae te lanza un guiño sugerente.{/n} «Prometo que seguiré aceptando cualquier regalo que quiera hacerme con reverencia y asombro».
languages.original_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."

traits.locale_text: «Como puede ver, sé cómo ser agradecida y generosa, igual que sé que usted sabe». {n}Jae te lanza un guiño sugerente.{/n} «Prometo que seguiré aceptando cualquier regalo que quiera hacerme con reverencia y asombro».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如你所见，我懂得感恩和慷慨，我相信你也是。”{n}婕伊暗示性地眨了眨眼睛。{/n}“我保证，今后我会继续怀着敬畏之心，接受你的每一份馈赠。”
languages.original_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."

traits.locale_text: “如你所见，我懂得感恩和慷慨，我相信你也是。”{n}婕伊暗示性地眨了眨眼睛。{/n}“我保证，今后我会继续怀着敬畏之心，接受你的每一份馈赠。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「見ての通り、あたしだって感謝の気持ちや寛大さってのをしてるよ。きっとあんたもそうでしょう」{n}ジェイは思わせぶりにウィンクをする。{/n}「今後もあんたからの贈り物はすべて、敬意と畏敬の念を持って受け取ることを約束するよ」
languages.original_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."

traits.locale_text: 「見ての通り、あたしだって感謝の気持ちや寛大さってのをしてるよ。きっとあんたもそうでしょう」{n}ジェイは思わせぶりにウィンクをする。{/n}「今後もあんたからの贈り物はすべて、敬意と畏敬の念を持って受け取ることを約束するよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Comme vous pouvez le constater, je sais me montrer reconnaissante et généreuse, et je suis sûre que vous aussi. {n}Jae vous adresse un clin d'œil suggestif.{/n} Je vous promets qu'à l'avenir, je continuerai d'accepter tous vos cadeaux avec le respect et l'admiration qui vous sont dus. »
languages.original_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous pouvez le constater, je sais me montrer reconnaissante et généreuse, et je suis sûre que vous aussi. {n}Jae vous adresse un clin d'œil suggestif.{/n} Je vous promets qu'à l'avenir, je continuerai d'accepter tous vos cadeaux avec le respect et l'admiration qui vous sont dus. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wie Ihr sehen könnt, weiß ich, wie man Dankbarkeit und Großzügigkeit beweist, und das wisst Ihr gewiss auch." {n}Jae zwinkert dir vielsagend zu.{/n} "Ich verspreche, ich werde auch weiterhin all Eure Geschenke voller Ehrfurcht und Verehrung annehmen."
languages.original_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr sehen könnt, weiß ich, wie man Dankbarkeit und Großzügigkeit beweist, und das wisst Ihr gewiss auch." {n}Jae zwinkert dir vielsagend zu.{/n} "Ich verspreche, ich werde auch weiterhin all Eure Geschenke voller Ehrfurcht und Verehrung annehmen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."

languages.text: "Gördüğün gibi minnettar ve cömert olmak nedir bilirim. Senin de bildiğine eminim." {n}Jae, imalı imalı göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Gelecekte de bütün hediyelerini hürmet ve huşu ile kabul etmeye devam edeceğime söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: "As you can see, I know how to be grateful and generous, and I'm sure you do too." {n}Jae winks suggestively.{/n} "I promise that I will continue to accept your every gift in the future with reverence and awe."

traits.locale_text: "Gördüğün gibi minnettar ve cömert olmak nedir bilirim. Senin de bildiğine eminim." {n}Jae imalı bir şekilde göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Gelecekte de bütün hediyelerini hürmet ve huşu ile kabul etmeye devam edeceğime söz veriyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
